text: Margaret Taylor Smith is an American author and social activist, and was chair of the Kresge Foundation until 1998. She received an A.B. in 1947 from Duke University, where the Margaret Taylor Smith Directorship in Women's Studies is named for her. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American activists Category:American women writers Category:Duke University alumni
title: Margaret Taylor Smith
